content:
Got it! With 20-25 people, you'll want to make sure you have a good variety of drinks and snacks to go around. Here are some suggestions to get you started:

**Drinks:**

* Soft drinks (e.g. cola, lemon-lime soda, root beer)
* Juice (e.g. orange, apple, cranberry)
* Water (you can't go wrong with this one!)
* Iced tea or herbal tea (if you think your family would enjoy it)
* Soda water with a few flavored options (e.g. lemon, lime, grapefruit)

**Snacks:**

* Veggie options:
	+ Chips and veggie sticks with hummus or guacamole
	+ Fresh fruit (e.g. grapes, berries, sliced apples)
	+ Trail mix with nuts and dried fruit
* Non-veggie options:
	+ Chips and crackers with cheese or peanut butter
	+ Popcorn kernels (you can flavor them with seasonings or cheese)
	+ Cookies or granola bars

**Miscellaneous:**

* Ice (if you're bringing cold drinks)
* Cups, plates, and utensils (if you're not sure if your aunt has enough)
* Napkins and paper towels

Feel free to add or remove items based on your family's preferences and your aunt's specific requests. You know them best!

Is there anything else you'd like to add to your list, or do you think this covers the basics?
